extendedInfo.description: A 'Maine-made' app by people who know and love Acadia National Park! OVer 300+ unique points of interest (POIs) throughout the Park. A 35 minute audio tour with all POIs along the Park Loop Road, GPS-enabled/custom-made/high-resolution map with the option of downloading for off-line usage, ranger-led event schedules, sunrise/sunsets and tidal data for a year, Island Explorer shuttle bus schedule, 45+ hiking trails, bicycling guide, and details on camping, horseback riding, lighthouses, museums, parking, restrooms, picnicking, swimming, birding, and boat launches throughout the Park.RICH CONTENT: + Content has been written by a professional travel writer.+ Over 100 professional photographs of park.+ Descriptions for 45 of the most popular hiking trails with the park. + Unique Safety section which details all the concerns while visiting the park. + Location and description of EVERY restroom in the park! + Location and description of EVERY parking lot in the park! + Location and description of EVERY picnic area lot in the park! + Over a years worth of tidal data (high/low tide) for the Park.+ Over a years worth of sunrise/sunset data for the Park.+ Details on bicycling, camping, lighthouses, museums, swimming, birding and boat launches throughout the park!MAPS: + NO CELL/WIFI CONNECTION REQUIRED! Download all the maps for offline usage.+ High resolution, topographic maps which you can edit!+ Carriage roads intersection labels.+ Hiking trails for the entire park.+ Interactive map annotations.Â  + GPS "where am I" function for the entire Park (does not work on non-GPS enabled devices such as the iPod Touch) Â  AUDIO/AUTO TOUR: + 35+ minute audio tour by a professional voiceover artist.Â  + 28 points of interest located in the Park Loop Road.RANGER-LED EVENTS SCHEDULE: + Daily National Park Service Ranger-led events are pre-loaded and updated automatically.+ Includes the time, optional fees, accessibility, meeting location, and description. + View multiple days of events.+ Updated on a regular basis.ISLAND EXPLORER SHUTTLE BUS SCHEDULE:* Complete Island Explorer FREE shuttle bus schedule.* Stop locations and times.* Simple, easy to read "Next Bus Arrives" interface.SUNRISE/SUNSET: + Sunrise and sunset data for seven of the best locations in the park.+ View any date within 365 days into the future.+ Updated on a regular basis.TIDE SCHEDULE:+ High and Low tide schedule for key locations throughout the park+ Tidal schedule for Thunder Hole, Bar Island, Sand Beach.+ View any date within 365 days into the future.+ Updated on a regular basis.INTERFACE: + Universal National Park Service symbols. + Search all content within the app.+ Favorites feature.PUSH NOTIFICATIONS: + Push notifications for park-related news, alerts, and events.+ Push notifications as soon as they are available.For more details on this and other Chimani apps for the national parks, visit www.chimani.com. Be sure to follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/chimani and Facebook at www.facebook.com/chimaniAndroid Permissions Request ExplanationFor human readable explanations on why this Chimani app is requesting various permissions on your device, please refer to our privacy policy at http://www.chimani.com/privacy.html.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Excellent app.  Thanks.
reviews.author: Joe Friday

reviews.title: Quite helpful
reviews.comment: I downloaded this for a week\'s visit to Acadia and I was quite pleased. The information was detailed and timely.
reviews.author: Michael Chermside

reviews.title: Lovely photo gallery
reviews.comment: Would be great if photos in gallery could be used as wallpaper.  Like tide charts and ability to use maps offline. IE bus routes listed, but no times. Overall, useful for basic trip planning to ANP.
reviews.author: Tracey Bailey

reviews.title: Very informative
reviews.comment: Have been using this app to plan my trip. All the information is great and I feel very prepared. I\'m excited to a how the location part will work and if it is just as great in acadia as it had been inplanning
reviews.author: Nikki Majeran

reviews.title: So useful!
reviews.comment: I own a gift shop in Bar Harbor, Maine, and this comes in so handy!
reviews.author: Shawn Porter

reviews.title: Acadia
reviews.comment: Acurate and helpful
reviews.author: Kevin Miller

reviews.title: Map crashes app!
reviews.comment: Every time I use the map application,  it crashes on my Droid Razor Maxx. Using ICS 4.0.4.

reviews.title: Everything Acadia
reviews.comment: This app has everything you need to enjoy Acadia national park.  A must get.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Asesine app, visiting next week
reviews.comment: Lay out is great and organized. Gonna test out the shuttle feature as me n fam are visiting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app... And FREE
reviews.comment: Totallu worth the few minutes to download.  Not perfect, but doesnt need to be. An awesome resource!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great with a few bugs - use WiFi!
reviews.comment: This app has a lot of helpful information displayed in an easy-to-use format. Hikes are sortable by time, distance, difficulty, or height of climb. The map is detailed and interactive, and the shuttle schedule gives you the time of the next bus and even tips if you miss the last one with your bike. It is very helpful, but has a few bugs - the app asks you each time to download \"AirMail\" to use the notifications, but that app is no longer available - just disable notifications in the settings window.   Also, when first downloaded, it stores the images, audio files, and maps offline - this is over a 100MB download, which would kill a cell phone battery if not on wifi - it takes a while to download (in the background), and it should give you the option to download it or not for those on a 3G connection...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Great app, very helpful. Could do with some stability and performance improvements but the content more than makes up for any bugs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Drained battery
reviews.comment: Needs something called airmail which is not available in the market. Drained battery on galaxy nexus in 4 hrs even though notifications are turned off. Content is great but useless if the phone is dead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: map crashes when zooming
reviews.comment: tons of great content but map crashed on me repeatedly. fix that and i\'d give it at least four stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No tide info
reviews.comment: I like the idea and interface for this app but I dowloaded it in August in order to see the tides at various locations around MDI. This feature does not work, something the developers acknowledged in their quick and polite response to my enquiry. They stated that they were working on it but could not give a date for its correction.  It is now October and still there is no fix.  See app \"US Tides\" if you need tides around MDI or any other US coastal area.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Many crash on Google nexus 7 when playing with the map.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GrGreat overview
reviews.comment: Gives a lot of useful information for the park and tidal times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Buggy, crashed multiple times at very inopportune times. Nothing you can\'t get for free from a park ranger or visitor center. Waste of $10!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: active updates not current or working which was the primary reason for download. Disappointed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No air mail
reviews.comment: App uses something called air mail which Google doesn\'t have!
